attributes.action: Trade embargo with Indonesia until they cease capital punishment
attributes.additional_details:
The Indonesian government has resumed capital punishment and unreasonably refuse to engage in adequate diplomatic discussions over the issue.
In view of the British & European lack of appetite towards capital punishment, I propose a more direct action towards convincing the Indonesian Government and her citizens that state-sanctioned murder is not an appropriate judicial action.
I propose that all trade between the UK and the Republic of Indonesia cease until the Government of Indonesia returns the issue to a moratorium at the very least.
